subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With receiver Terrell Owens on his team, Bill Parcells has become a secondary attraction. But according to Parcells, much of the attention around Owens has been blown out of proportion.
snippet: With receiver Terrell Owens on his team, Bill Parcells has become a secondary attraction. But according to Parcells, much of the attention around Owens has been blown out of proportion.
